title: Partner With Locally Strong
intro: Corporate and organizational partnerships amplify our impact and provide meaningful engagement opportunities for your team and stakeholders.

whyPartner.title: Why Partner With Us
points: Demonstrate commitment to local economic development
Connect with engaged community members who value local business
Provide meaningful volunteer opportunities for employees
Receive recognition across our markets, events, and communications
Support measurable impact in small business growth and community health

tiers.name: Community Champion
benefits: Premier logo placement at all markets and events
Featured in all press releases and major communications
Exclusive volunteer day for up to 20 employees
Speaking opportunity at annual celebration event
Custom impact report on your sponsorship
Social media partnership (4 dedicated posts annually)

tiers.name: Market Sustainer
benefits: Logo on market signage and event materials
Volunteer day for up to 10 employees
Invitation to VIP partner appreciation event

programs.name: Vendor Fee Sponsorship
programs.description: Sponsor market fees for new or struggling vendors, reducing financial barriers to participation.

programs.name: Technology Access Program
programs.description: Fund point-of-sale systems and online ordering tools for vendors who couldn't otherwise afford them.
programs.impact: $1,000 equips one vendor with modern payment technology

programs.name: Mobile Market Initiative
programs.description: Support our mobile market truck bringing fresh food to underserved areas.

formIntro: Interested in exploring a partnership? Tell us about your organization and goals.
